name: Verify Get Chatbot API returns "Not Found" for a valid chatbot_id but non-existing chatbot -- @1.1

steps.name: Given User sends GET request to fetch chatbot details with chatbot_id "d8d4c7b6-a4a4-4839-94d5-da4bb139043f"
When the user receives the response
Then the status code returned should be 404 for "Not Found"
And the error message should state Chatbot with ID not found.

fullName: Verify Get Chatbot API: Verify Get Chatbot API returns "Not Found" for a valid chatbot_id but non-existing chatbot
